alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 28 at 10:02AM EDT until June 28 at 10:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Flood waters will affect swamplands adjacent to the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 10.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
